GeneDef.label: very weak mech repair
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have extreme issues repairing damaged mechanoids, requiring more time to fix damage.\n\nThis will not change the total amount of energy required for repairing.

GeneDef.label: weak mech repair
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have issues repairing damaged mechanoids, requiring more time to fix damage.\n\nThis will not change the total amount of energy required for repairing.

GeneDef.label: somewhat fast mech repair speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have slightly improved mech repair speed, decreasing the amount of time they need to take to repair a mech.\n\nThis will not change the total amount of energy required for repairing.

GeneDef.label: fast mech repair speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have improved mech repair speed, decreasing the amount of time they need to take to repair a mech.\n\nThis will not change the total amount of energy required for repairing.

GeneDef.label: very fast mech repair speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have significantly improved mech repair speed, decreasing the amount of time they need to take to repair a mech.\n\nThis will not change the total amount of energy required for repairing.

GeneDef.label: extremely fast mech repair speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have extremely improved mech repair speed, decreasing the amount of time they need to take to repair a mech.\n\nThis will not change the total amount of energy required for repairing.

GeneDef.label: super fast mech repair speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have super improved mech repair speed, decreasing the amount of time they need to take to repair a mech.\n\nThis will not change the total amount of energy required for repairing.

GeneDef.label: hyper fast mech repair speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can repair mechs unbelievably quickly.\n\nThis will not change the total amount of energy required for repairing.
